message:
Curious of what’s inside the #LGG5 package? Let #LGCat walk you through with some tips from its friend!
Oh, don’t forget! A world of play is coming on April 1st.

✔ Explore all about the LG G5 here: http://bit.ly/2192t7Y

#LG #G5 #LGG5andFriends #PlayMore

Giving a neater look with its retractable earbuds at the end of each tip, the smooth and seamlessly designed LG Tone Infinim will add a modern and distinctive style to your life.

#LG #LGToneInfinim #ToneInfinim #Set_the_Tone

Even small elements can bring bigger changes in life.  Draw your way to more possibilities with the LG Stylus 2 and its precise fiber-tipped pen!

✔ Watch what the LG Stylus 2 pen can do: http://bit.ly/1Mm1t9R

#LG #LGStylus2 #Stylus2

#LGPlayCat loves to have fun with two modular friends of #LGG5. 
But sometimes it wants more! 
Which friend do you think LG Play Cat needs the most?

1. Game controller module 
2. Projector module 
3. Photo printer module 
4. Qwerty keyboard module 
5. Healthcare module 
6. Credit card reader module 
7. Large capacity battery module
8. Action cam module
9. SSD module
10. Speaker module

Pick one for our dear LG Play Cat!
✔ Click to learn all about the LG G5: http://bit.ly/2192t7Y

#LG #LGG5 #G5 #LGG5andFriends
*LG Electronics reserve all rights of the ideas for any future use.

The LG G5 has surprised many with its first ever slide-out modular design. Now easily remove batteries and use other fun features just by switching the bottom! 

✔ Explore everything about the LG G5 here: http://bit.ly/2192t7Y

#LG #LGG5 #G5 #LGG5andFriends

Experience a new level of audio performance with the LG Tone Infinim! With the Harman Kardon Signature Sound and advanced Quad-Layer speaker technology, you will be able to hear the well-balanced robust bass and crisp treble.

#LG #LGToneInfinim #ToneInfinim #Set_the_Tone

Even an identical scene can show differently depending on where  it’s displayed. Make colors pop and relive the moment with the LG G5!

✔ Want to learn more about the LG G5? Click here: http://bit.ly/2192t7Y

#LG #LGG5 #G5

Start making smart changes with the LG X series. Take a look and enjoy Second Screen in LG X screen and Dual Camera in LG X cam. 

✔ Full version can also be found in our official YouTube channel: http://bit.ly/1KM4uFn

#LG #LGXseries #LGXscreen #LGXcam #Xscreen #Xcam #SecondScreen #DualCamera

Frame the everyday life with uniqueness!
#LG #Xcam’s Pop-out Picture lets you freely decorate and edit your special snaps with various effects.

✔ Watch the official product video here: http://bit.ly/1KM4uFn
#LGXSeries #XSeries #Popoutpicture #DualCamera

The LG G5 is even special from the start.
Specifically designed to highlight its first ever modular design, the LG G5 slide-out package offers a unique unboxing experience. 
Stay tuned as the LG G5 continues to bring playful moments to you!

✔ What to do after unboxing? Learn all about the LG G5 here: http://bit.ly/2192t7Y

#LG #LGG5 #G5

Color matters when it comes to setting your mood for the day. Be bold today and lovely tomorrow with the four adorable colors of the LG G5!

✔ Color is not all. Learn other features of the LG G5 here: http://bit.ly/2192t7Y

#LG #LGG5 #G5

Had trouble delivering your message while calling in subways or crowded streets? LG Tone Infinim will deliver your voice clearly and naturally even in noisy environments with its dual MEMS microphones.

#LG #LGToneInfinim #ToneInfinim #Set_the_Tone

Good moments are meant to be shared with your loved ones and you know the LG G5 can help escalate that moment to a different level. 

✔ Learn other fun features of the LG G5 here: http://bit.ly/2192t7Y

#LG #LGG5 #G5

A perfect pair that goes along well with the full metal body of the LG G5, the LG CAM Plus will help make shooting convenient and also enable a ‘camera-grip’ even on a phone!

✔ Learn other features of the LG G5 here: http://bit.ly/2192t7Y

#LG #LGG5 #G5 #LGG5andFriends

The LG G5's playful spirit has entered the world of Baduk.
Legendary Baduk player Lee Sedol is now competing against AI program AlphaGo at the Google DeepMind Challenge Match!
Click now to watch the grand match!
#LG #LGG5 #G5 #Leesedol #AlphaGo

Don’t just let you ears listen, but enjoy! Elevate your acoustic experience and give life to the notes you hear with the LG Hi-Fi Plus with B&O Play. Simply swap the bottom of your LG G5 and let it do its trick from there!

✔ Want to know how it works? http://bit.ly/2192t7Y

#LG #LGG5 #G5 #LGG5andFriends

Reach freely whenever, wherever with the LG Tone Infinim and communicate clearly regardless of your surroundings through its enhanced sound and speaker.

#LG #LGToneInfinim #ToneInfinim #Set_the_Tone

Not just playful, but extremely fun!
With the new LG G5 and its ground breaking friends, endless excitement awaits!

✔ Learn the fun features of the LG G5 here: http://bit.ly/2192t7Y

#LG #LGG5 #G5

Enjoy the beauties of the new LG X series at different angles! 
Crisper in design and packed with edgy high-end functions like the second screen for LG X Screen and dual camera for LG X Cam, the LG X series will have best qualities of a smartphone more approachable.

✔ Watch the official product video here: http://bit.ly/1KM4uFn

#LG #LGXSeries #Xseries #Xscreen #XCam

The LG G5 will bring you playful moments with its friends, each enabling different skill sets to users. Meet our lovely friends that will present to you a whole new visual and acoustic experience!

✔ Learn other features of the LG G5 here: http://bit.ly/2192t7Y

#LG #LGG5 #G5 #LGG5andFriends #LGPlayCat

Would you like to play with LG G5 & Friends?

https://youtu.be/PlStUiB1xSE

#LG #LGG5 #G5

It’s always great to be recognized.
At the recent GSMA Global Mobile Awards, the LG G5 won the ‘Best Mobile Handsets & Devices’ category for bringing an unprecedented modular design and unique friends to the market. Congratulate with us on our winning and stay tuned as the LG G5 continues to bring exciting news to us all!

✔ Learn the fun features of the LG G5 here: http://bit.ly/1Rh9RLS
#LG #LGG5 #G5 #MWC2016

LG’s removable battery has been a charm point for years. But now with the LG G5, LG has given an innovative twist by having its battery pulled down rather than taken out from the back!

✔ Learn other fun features of the LG G5 here: http://bit.ly/1Rh9RLS

#LG #LGG5 #G5

It’s always better to have more fun.
Let playfulness come to you with the unexpected, uniquely designed and surprising LG G5!

✔ Watch the official product video here: http://bit.ly/1XFx9xn

#LG #LGG5 #G5

Experience the magic of the new LG Stylus 2 and the enhanced Stylus pen! Gearing up with a nano-coated tip, the new Stylus pen will offer more accuracy and better multimedia experience. 
More things are now possible in your life with the LG Stylus 2.

✔ Learn its abilities by watching the official product video here:
https://youtu.be/gAScMfQ5Z0Q

#LG #LGStylus2 #Stylus2 #LGSmartphone

As MWC 2016 comes to an end, LG has been awarded with the largest number of prizes, 33 so far, including Best Mobile Handsets & Devices Award, the event’s top honor! The wins highlighted the modular type innovation, the LG G5 and Friends, demonstrating LG is at the forefront of the mobile industry.
Congratulate with us on LG’s success and take a look at the heated moments!

✔ Watch the LG G5 product video here: http://bit.ly/1XFx9xn

#LG #LGG5 #G5 #MWC2016 #Barcelona

Pleasant to the eyes and softer to the hands with a smoother surface, the new LG G5 comes in four adorable colors that make it difficult to let go!

✔ Watch the official product video here: http://bit.ly/1XFx9xn

#LG #LGG5 #G5

With the new playful LG G5 and friends, LG has wowed and is continuing to amaze the media at the ongoing MWC 2016 event. Read through to figure out why Forbes describes the LG G5 a brilliantly designed ‘superstar android phone.’ 

✔ Watch the official product video here: http://bit.ly/1XFx9xn

#LG #LGG5 #G5

It’s playtime with the #LGG5 & friends! 
Have the LG G5 & friends your way and make each moment boredom-free!

✔ Watch the introduction of the LG G5 video here: 
https://youtu.be/y5Aj3mEvCa4

#LGMobile #G5 #LGSmartphone

Introducing the utmost technological innovation, the LG G5! 
Every part of its feature and design has upgraded, transforming into a 'radical invention' as described by the Verge. Whatever you have imagined about a smartphone, the new #LGG5 will exceed your imagination. 

✔ Watch the official product video here: 
http://bit.ly/1ovxGG1

#LG #G5 #MWC #Barcelona

Blink of an eye can lose the details.
But time to secure it all.
Splash  dynamism into every move you make with the LG V10. 

✔ Watch the official product video here: http://bit.ly/1GxxpFp

#LG #LGV10 #V10

Taste and feel the liveliness captured by the sleek and durable LG V10.

✔ Watch the official product video here: http://bit.ly/1GxxpFp

#LG #LGV10 #V10

The LG G5 arrives in Barcelona, Spain on Feb. 21st!
Come and meet new friends on the playground through the live streaming link below.
Show starts at 14:00 CET so make sure to mark that time!

✔ Watch the live streaming here(Feb 21st): https://www.youtube.com/user/LGMobileHQ  

#LG #LGG5 #G5

Easy is always fun.
It’s possible to take lasting images even with only a handful action. Simply form a fist and then let go for a quick, quality shooting using the LG K10 gesture shot.

✔ Watch the official product video here: 
http://bit.ly/1RF06Ko

#LG #LGK10 #K10

Make your everyday the sweetest day of the year with the long-lasting and lovely LG V10.
Happy Valentine’s Day !

✔ Don’t forget to watch the official product video here: http://bit.ly/1GxxpFp

#LG #LGV10 #V10

Introducing the new LG G5 Quick Cover with everything you need. 
Another first-time-ever smartphone case is here!

#LG #LGG5 #G5

The new K10 cover defies the traditional meaning of a cover. Now receive calls and check incoming messages with the stylishly designed, ergonomic K10 quick cover view.

✔ Watch the official product video here: http://bit.ly/1RF06Ko

#LG #LGK10 #K10

Never go asleep while others do.
LG G5, Always ON.
#LG #LGG5 #G5

Sleekly  designed to fit perfectly around your neck, the new addition in LG’s signature Tone Infinim line-up boasts not only looks but superb sound quality backed with high-performance Quad Layer Speaker Technology™ paired with Harman Kardon® Signature Sound.

#LG #LGToneInfinim #Toneinfinim

It’s all about harmonizing the elements around you for the best outcome. Make sure you keep the greens, the architecture and the sky all in one scene with the LG V10.

The new LG K series define ‘affordable’ as ‘quality made approachable.’
